price: Allah mengetahui apa yang dikandung oleh setiap perempuan, apa yang kurang sempurna dan apa yang bertambah dalam rahim. Dan segala sesuatu ada ukuran di sisi-Nya.
arabic: ٱللَّهُ يَعۡلَمُ مَا تَحۡمِلُ كُلُّ أُنثَىٰ وَمَا تَغِيضُ ٱلۡأَرۡحَامُ وَمَا تَزۡدَادُۚ وَكُلُّ شَيۡءٍ عِندَهُۥ بِمِقۡدَارٍ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - Ministry of Islamic Affairs
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Notice: Some referred translated verses corrected by Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu yaʿlamu mā taḥmilu kullu unthā wamā taghīḍu al-arḥāmu wamā tazdādu wakullu shayin ʿindahu bimiq'dārin
